rooms.description: Average size 40 sqm / 441 sqf Large “queen-size” bed or 2 twin beds Possibility of accommodating three people with an extra bed (free for children under 12) View of the street – possibility of a balcony Air conditioning – Sound-proofing Bathroom with separate shower unit (Molton Brown welcome products) Minibar Free Wi-Fi internet connection Direct telephone line with messaging service Flat-screen television, radio, video-on-demand Safe deposit box Heated trouser press

Total surface area 104 sqm / 1098 sqf 2 large bedrooms with bathrooms (with separate shower) Large independent sitting room between the two bedrooms with armchairs and sofa bed Upper floors, view over the street only Balcony Air-conditioning – Sound-proofing Molton Brown welcome products in the bathroom Minibar Free Wi-Fi internet connection Direct telephone line with messaging service Flat-screen television, radio, video-on-demand Safe deposit box Heated trouser press

Spacious double bedroom, with digital flatscreen tv, wifi. Decorated with double side painted art door and art of RUA artist. This room is part of apartment no 4  with 2 spacious double bedrooms with shared bathroom, seperated toilet and large shared basic equiped kitchen with terrace Minimum stay  two nights.

Would you like to relax completely? Then we recommend this themed room without daylight. Each room is individually furnished with a double bed, air conditioning, coffee and tea-making facilities and a flat screen TV. The open bathroom and toilet adjoin the sleeping area, creating an open atmosphere in this special room.
